document_data.name: Thindhul
document_data.mainbody:
'''Thindhul''' was one of the [[Empyrean Knight]]s until {{yearlink|1375}}. After the [[Keeper of the Cerulean Sign]] [[Telarian]] struck Commanders [[Brathtar]] and [[Dharvanum]] down,{{cite book/Stardeep|159-160|14}} he hastily promoted Thindhul to the position of Commander, so that he could lead their passage to [[Sildëyuir]] across the [[Underdungeon]] of [[Stardeep]].{{cite book/Stardeep|190|17}}

Thindhul was nervous, feeling unprepared for the task.{{cite book/Stardeep|229|21}} He failed to stand up to even the most ridiculous of Telarian's orders during the ride, agreeing even to the suggestion to ask a [[relic lich]] for directions, despite his own better judgement saying otherwise.{{cite book/Stardeep|234-238|21}}
